fire.ability.name: Blazing Gaze
fire.ability.description: Create an area of flames where you look
hammer.ability.name: Explosion
hammer.ability.description: Create an explosive area dealing massive damage
wings.of.doom.tooltip: Inflicts them with Poison and Withering
wings.of.doom.tooltip.2: make them slow, blind and weak
wings.of.doom.tooltip.3: and with dark they can's see
wings.of.doom.abilitys.name: Black Hole
wings.of.doom.ability.description: Create a Black Hole in the World and consume everything
wither.ability.name: Wither Rain
wither.ability.description: Launch wither skulls from your sword
book.weaponseffect.name: Weapons Effect
book.weaponseffect.landing_text: Weapons Effect adds new weapons with effects that will change your combat experience and way of thinking. This Guide Book will teach you how the mod works, like, ''What this weapon can benefit you and what you can do with it'', or ''I don't know where can i get this ore?''. So i hope this guide book can help you with my mod, and have fun!
book.weaponseffect.category.crafting.des: This category is to show some basic recipes and how to make them.
book.weaponseffect.category.ores.name: Ores
book.weaponseffect.category.ores.descrip: This category is about the ores and dimensions you can get the ores of the mod and where you can find them.
book.weaponseffect.category.weapons.name: Weapons
book.weaponseffect.category.weapons.desc: This category is about the weapons and their effects.
book.weaponseffect.entry.crafting.page.1: The Simple Crafting Table is the new custom crafting table for this mod and this will allow you to craft $(bold)ALL$() the weapons of this mod.
book.weaponseffect.entry.crafting.page.2: This Book is to help you with the recipes, ores and weapons for this mod, and how you can craft and find them.
book.weaponseffect.entry.crafting.page.3: At first this recipes may be a little scary/hard to make, but trust me, it's going to be really worth it.
This ore is the most basic ore of this mod and the easiest to get.
Get Ignitha ore between layer $(bold)0 and 60$(), and deepslate ignitha ore between layer $(bold)-30 and 0$().
This ore is a little bit more dificult to get since only spawn in the deepslate, but it is commun in the deepslate and you can start doing pretty good things with it.
Get this ore between layer $(bold)-30 and -58$().

This ore is the same as the previous one, a little bit more dificult to get since only spawn in the deepslate, but it is commun in the deepslate and you can also start doing pretty good things with it.
Get this ore between layer $(bold)-30 and -58$().

Now, this Ore in specific is the most dificult to get from them all, and you $(bold)CAN'T$() break it if a pickaxe, you $(bold)MUST$() use $(bold)TNT$() to break it and have a $(bold)CHANCE$() to get the block or the item, $(bold)Good Luck$().
Get this ore between layer $(bold)-59 and -63$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.nether.page.1: This ore you can get on the nether everywhere, like quartzo, and you can use it as $(bold)FUEL$() and has double the duration of the $(bold)COAL$(), for now only the item can be use as fuel later on i will add the block to.
book.weaponseffect.entry.nether.page.2: Get this ore between layer $(bold)40 and 126$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.end.page.1: Now this ore is pretty dificult to get no more than the $(bold)Bedrock Obscuridium$() but dificult, and with this ore you can craft the most powerfull weapons in the mod currently available, $(bold)you don't need to kill the dragon to mine this ore$(), but you need to kill it to get out so, $(bold)KILL IT NOW$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.end.page.2: Get this ore between layer $(bold)10 and 50$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.end.page.3: Now this ore is the same as the previous one, pretty dificult to get no more than the $(bold)Bedrock Obscuridium$() but dificult, and with this ore you can also craft the most powerfull weapons in the mod currently available, $(bold)you don't need to kill the dragon to mine this ore$(), but you need to kill it to get out so, $(bold)KILL IT NOW$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.end.page.4: Get this ore between layer $(bold)10 and 50$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.1: The Blindness Dagger, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#555555)Blindness$() to the enemies. and it gives you Immunity to $(bold)$(#555555)Blindness$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.2: The Darkness Mace, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#555555)Darkness and Slowness$() to the enemies. and it gives you $(bold)$(#555555)Resistance and Strength$() also gives you Immunity to $(bold)$(#555555)Darkness$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.3: The Fire Sword has an Ability $(bold)$(#AA0000)Blazing Gaze$() that shots a area of fire, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#AA0000)Fire$() to the enemies. and it gives you Immunity to $(bold)$(#AA0000)Fire and lava$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.4: The Gimli's Axe, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Slowness$() to the enemies. and it gives you $(bold)$(#3F3F3F)Resistance and $(#3F3F3F)Strength$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.5: The Hammer, has an Ability $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Explosion$(), create an explosive area dealing massive damage, it gives you $(bold)$(#3F3F3F)Strength$() and Inflict $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Slowness$() to the enemies.
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.6: The Ice Sword has the freezing effect that can chill the enemies, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#2CBAA8)Slowness$() to the enemies. and gives you Immunity to $(bold)$(#2CBAA8)Slowness$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.7: The Lance has the ability to be throwed really fast and causing a lot of damage, it can give you $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Speed and Strength$(). also gives you $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Immunity to Slowness$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.8: The Poison Sword, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#00AA00)Poison$() to the enemies. also give you Immunity to $(bold)$(#00AA00)Poison$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.9: The Swiftness Dagger, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#00AA00)Poison$() to the enemies. Gives you $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Speed$() and Immunity to $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Slowness$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.10: The Wings Of Doom, has the Ability $(bold)$(#000000)Black Hole$() that can devour the world, it can inflict $(bold)$(#00AA00)Poison$(), $(bold)$(#151515)Wither$(), $(bold)$(#555555)Slowness$(), $(bold)$(#000000)Blindness$(), $(bold)$(#151515)Darkness$(), $(bold)$(#555555)Weakness$(), $(bold)$(#15153F)Mining Fatigue$() and $(bold)$(#AA0000)Fire$() to the enemies. it gives to you $(bold)$(#AAAAAA)Speed, $(#2A2A2A)Resistance, $(#AAAAAA)Night Vision, $(#971607)Regeneration, $(#971607)Saturaion, $(#AA0000)Fire Resistance and $(#2A2A2A)Strength$().
book.weaponseffect.entry.weapons.page.12: The Wither Sword, has an Ability $(bold)$(#555555)Wither Rain$() that can shot 8 wither skulls, it can Inflict $(bold)$(#555555)Wither$() to the enemies. and gives you Immunity to $(bold)$(#555555)Wither$().
